task-1768730716475-li3esh.description: Create core CRM interfaces, provider abstraction, and configuration management in /backend/crm/. Define CRMProvider interface with methods for contacts, deals, activities. Implement config.go with encrypted credential storage and provider management.

task-1768730716587-dxvwuq.description: Implement HubSpot API v3 integration in hubspot.go with contact sync, deal tracking, activity logging, rate limiting (100 req/10s), retry logic with exponential backoff, and lead scoring based on trading behavior.

task-1768730716673-nhc0x6.description: Implement Salesforce REST API integration in salesforce.go with OAuth2 authentication, contact/account sync, opportunity tracking, activity logging, rate limiting per Salesforce limits, and custom field mapping.

task-1768730716756-28efvr.description: Implement Zoho CRM integration in zoho.go with API v2 support, contact sync, deal management, activity tracking, rate limiting, and webhook support for real-time updates.

task-1768730716836-0wzurn.description: Build webhook handler in webhook.go for receiving CRM events, validating webhook signatures, processing contact updates, deal changes, activity notifications, and triggering bidirectional sync.

task-1768730716917-1yg2dk.description: Create bidirectional sync engine in sync.go with conflict resolution, delta sync, retry logic with exponential backoff, sync status tracking, error logging, and scheduled sync jobs for contacts, deals, and activities.

task-1768730717026-cv5uvp.description: Add CRM endpoints to admin API handlers: GET/POST /admin/crm/providers, POST /admin/crm/sync, GET /admin/crm/logs, POST /admin/crm/webhook, with proper authentication, permissions, and audit logging.

task-1768730717134-l8dbng.description: Create database migration 002_crm_integration.go with tables: crm_providers (id, type, config_encrypted, status), crm_sync_logs (id, provider_id, entity_type, sync_status, error), crm_webhooks (id, provider_id, event_type, payload, processed_at).

task-1768730717253-yx0nv0.description: Write comprehensive CRM integration documentation in /backend/docs/CRM_INTEGRATION.md covering setup guides for each provider, API endpoints, webhook configuration, sync behavior, error handling, rate limits, and troubleshooting.
